text: Today we commentate the death of Cuban opposition leader Oswaldo Payá, who was brutally assassinated by the Castro dictatorship six years ago. Payá’s tireless work for a free and democratic #Cuba will always be remembered. May he rest In peace.

Hoy conmemoramos la muerte del opositor cubano Oswaldo Payá, quien fue brutalmente asesinado por la dictadura de los Castro hace seis años. El incansable trabajo de Payá por una #Cuba libre y democrática siempre será recordado. Que descanse en paz.
When he disembarked and saw the vast crowd, his heart was moved with pity for them, for they were like sheep without a shepherd; and he began to teach them many things.  Mark 6:34
